## Beamer-lysbilder i Quarto: UiO-mal

```
---
title: Mal for Beamer-presentasjon med UiO-logo i Quarto
author: Jacob Høigilt
institute: Institutt for kulturstudier og orientalske språk, Universitetet i Oslo
date: today
format:
    beamer:
        theme: Bergen
        #institute: IKOS
        #aspectratio: 169
        #logo: uio_full_logo_no_pos.png

header-includes:

## Revealjs-lysbilder - UiO-mal

```
---
title: Template for Beamer slides with UiO logo in Quarto
author: Jacob Høigilt
institute: Department of Culture Studies and Oriental Languages, University of Oslo
date: 1/12/2023
format:
    revealjs:
        smaller: true
        scrollable: true
        # The above to adapt text overflow to slide size globally
        embed-resources: true
        theme: simple # see https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/revealjs/ for list of premade themes
        footer: jacobhoi@uio.no
        logo: uio_full_logo_no_pos.png
        css: logo.css #Needed to resize too small logo image
